Package part1

Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • part1.Triangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    part1.Drawable
    public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements part1.Drawable
    This class represents a 2d triangle in the plane by three points.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Triangle​(part1.Point p1, part1.Point p2, part1.Point p3)
      This constructor builds a triangle using three points.
      Triangle​(Triangle other)
      This constructor build triangle using another triangle.
